tracks.title: The Assassin Descends
tracks.voice_instruct: A haunted, controlled male tenor with Middle Eastern inflections, restrained power barely containing anguish, breathy and precise
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, dark orchestral metal, rising chromatic stormwall motif in strings, distorted industrial Thrill riff with drop-tuned bitcrushed power chord, thunderous tympani crescendo, dramatic male vocals, Middle Eastern scales, concept album continuity, theatrical, intense opening number
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
White on white, I walk these palace halls,
A truthless man who answers when duty calls,
My Oathstone heavy, my spirit hollowed clean,
The storm is rising on this treaty's dying dream.

[verse 2]
The king stands tall beneath the chandeliers,
His words of peace still ringing in their ears,
But I was sent, my masters gave the word,
And heaven forgive, their will must be heard.

[chorus]
I am the storm that walks on silent feet,
I am the blade that makes the world complete,
Szeth-son-son-Vallano, Truthless, shamed,
The wind obeys, and Gavilar is claimed.

[bridge]
Lash the ceiling, lash the floor,
Gravity bends and kings are kings no more,
The Thrill, red mist in another man's eye,
Tonight a kingdom learns its king must die.

[verse 3]
He whispers something, presses a dark sphere,
"Brother, you must find the most important words,"
But I am only wind, I cannot hear,
I am only duty, sharper than the swords.

[outro]
The stormwall breaks across the Shattered Plains,
And nothing, nothing will be whole again.

tracks.title: Truthless
tracks.voice_instruct: A haunted, controlled male tenor with Middle Eastern inflections, restrained power barely containing anguish, breathy and precise
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, melancholic post-rock, fading industrial Thrill riff, distant distorted Honor's Theme echo, atmospheric guitar layers, haunted male vocals, sparse percussion building to crescendo, concept album continuity, theatrical
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I killed a king and wore his blood like rain,
Passed hand to hand, a weapon without name,
Each master smaller than the one before,
A living blade behind a beggar's door.

[verse 2]
The spheres have gone dark but one still glows,
A black sphere burning where no stormlight flows,
His final words keep circling in my skull,
The most important words, and I am null.

[chorus]
Truthless, they call me, stone around my neck,
I am the consequence they do not check,
I walk through nations, leave them stained and red,
The assassin lives, but Szeth may be dead.

[bridge]
Somewhere there's a theme, a hymn, a prayer,
Honor's distant echo in the frozen air,
But I have forfeited the right to hear,
I am only purpose, I am only fear.

[verse 3]
They'll send me back, I know they will, in time,
To Alethkar, to finish what was mine,
And I will go, because the stone commands,
A storm that only moves at other hands.

[outro]
Truthless, truthless, stone and shame,
The wind remembers Szeth's forgotten name.

tracks.title: Branded
tracks.voice_instruct: A raw, emotionally intense male baritone with grit and defiance, like a wounded soldier singing through pain, powerful chest voice with breaks of vulnerability
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, raw acoustic opening building to heavy rock, no recurring motifs yet, stark silence and isolation, military snare drums, defiant male vocals, gritty electric guitar, concept album continuity, theatrical, bridgeman's march rhythm
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
They carved the brand into my forehead's skin,
Three lines of shame for crimes I did not win,
A surgeon's son who tried to save a life,
Now sold and chained and sharpened like a knife.

[verse 2]
The Shattered Plains, a graveyard made of stone,
Where bridges run on backs of flesh and bone,
They call it Bridge Four, where the hopeless go,
Where men stop praying, where the dead march slow.

[chorus]
Branded, broken, bridgeman, slave,
They stole my name and dug my grave,
But I am still the man who held the spear,
And something in the wind says, "I am here."

[bridge]
Tien, little brother, I can see your face,
You smiled at rocks and found the light in every place,
They took you from me, took you with a war,
And I became this thing I stand before.

[verse 3]
The bridge is heavy, and the arrows fly,
And one by one the bridgemen drop and die,
But something stubborn in me will not break,
I carry them, I carry, for their sake.

[outro]
Branded, bridgeman, not yet done,
The darkest night still waits upon the sun.

tracks.title: Syl
tracks.voice_instruct: A raw, emotionally intense male baritone with grit and defiance, softening to tenderness, powerful chest voice with breaks of vulnerability
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, gentle acoustic verses with ethereal synth pads, faint half-formed Honor's Theme hymn-like major key melody on clean guitar arpeggio, windchime textures, building to anthemic rock chorus, tender male vocals, concept album continuity, theatrical
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
A little light that dances on the breeze,
She laughs at gravity, she laughs at me,
"What are you?" but she only tilts her head,
A thousand words behind the things unsaid.

[verse 2]
She sits upon my shoulder in the rain,
And something in her presence dulls the pain,
I used to lead, I used to hold the line,
I used to be a man, before the brine.

[chorus]
Syl, Syl, little wisp of light,
You remind me I was born to fight,
Not for glory, not for any throne,
But for the ones who cannot stand alone.

[bridge]
A melody, half-heard, a hymn, a thread,
Honor's promise whispered to the dead,
I cannot name it, but I feel it stir,
The man I was is waking up in her.

[verse 3]
She says I spoke some words once, in a dream,
A promise burning brighter than it seemed,
"I will protect," she says, and waits for more,
But I'm not ready, not ready for that door.

[outro]
Little light, keep shining, keep me whole,
There are storms ahead that need a bridgeman's soul.

tracks.title: Highstorm
tracks.voice_instruct: A raw, emotionally intense male baritone with grit and defiance, building from suffering to transcendence, powerful chest voice breaking into soaring high notes
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, epic storm sequence, full rising chromatic stormwall motif ascending half-step string run with thunderous tympani crescendo, Honor's Theme hymn-like melody breaking through on choir unison, massive orchestral rock, rain and wind sound design, dramatic male vocals, concept album continuity, theatrical, transformative climax
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
They lashed me to the wall and left me bare,
The highstorm coming, thunder splits the air,
A punishment for daring to resist,
A bridgeman hanging in the tempest's fist.

[verse 2]
The wall of rain, the wind that strips the stone,
I feel the world dissolve, I'm all alone,
But in the eye, between the lightning's flash,
A light pours in through every wound and gash.

[chorus]
The stormwall breaks and I am not destroyed,
I breathe the light, I fill the empty void,
Stormlight in my veins like liquid fire,
The storm that broke me lifts me ever higher.

[bridge]
I see the face of something vast and old,
A figure in the storm, a story told,
"The words," it whispers through the hurricane,
"Speak them, and you'll never break again."

[verse 3]
I land upon the ground, the storm moves on,
The ropes are burned, the chains of doubt are gone,
The bridgemen stare, they do not understand,
But Syl is glowing, landing on my hand.

[outro]
The storm has passed but something new remains,
Stormlight burning through a bridgeman's veins.

tracks.title: The Girl Who Looked Up
tracks.voice_instruct: A bright, theatrical female soprano with an undercurrent of darkness, witty delivery that cracks into raw emotion, versatile between playful and devastating
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, folk-rock verses with dark undertones, deliberate absence of motifs, acoustic guitar and strings, theatrical female vocals, building to dramatic chorus, concept album continuity, theatrical, character introduction
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Father's dead by my own hand, by my own blade,
Mother before him, a truth I've carefully unmade,
I paint the world in colors that are kind,
And lock the real Shallan far behind.

[verse 2]
A carriage to Kharbranth, a scholar's dream,
I'll steal a Soulcaster, I'll run a scheme,
For my brothers, for the house that's falling down,
I'll wear a smile and play the clever clown.

[chorus]
I am the girl who looked up at the wall,
I am the one who wanted to see it all,
But every truth I find just breaks apart,
Another mask to hide my shattered heart.

[bridge]
Draw the world, Shallan, draw it bright,
Sketch the lies until they look like light,
Memories are monsters, keep them locked away,
Pretend the girl you were died yesterday.

[verse 3]
Jasnah Kholin waits with questions sharp as steel,
She'll see right through the masks, she'll make me feel,
But I am good at hiding, good at art,
I'll sketch my way around her scholar's heart.

[outro]
The girl who looked up, the girl who lied,
The girl who killed and never even cried.

tracks.title: Kharbranth
tracks.voice_instruct: A bright, theatrical female soprano with an undercurrent of darkness, witty delivery that cracks into raw emotion, versatile between playful and devastating
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, Mediterranean-flavored rock with ascending chromatic stormwall motif for shipwreck sequence, faint Honor's Theme hymn-like melody in background strings during lecture scenes, dramatic female vocals, orchestral arrangements, concept album continuity, theatrical
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
The ship went down in walls of wind and sea,
I drew the storm to keep my sanity,
Salt and chaos, timbers cracking wide,
The stormwall rose, but I survived the tide.

[verse 2]
Kharbranth, city carved into the cliff,
A thousand books behind each marble rift,
Jasnah stands like certainty made flesh,
And I, a liar tangled in my mesh.

[chorus]
Learn the words, learn the ancient text,
Steal the stone, before she sees what's next,
Kharbranth holds the knowledge of the world,
But I'm just a desperate, scheming girl.

[bridge]
She lectures on the fall of old Natanatan,
On oaths and honor, how it all began,
There's something in her voice, a melody,
A hymn of purpose, calling out to me.

[verse 3]
The Soulcaster gleams upon her wrist,
A tool that bends the world with just a twist,
I need it, storms, I need it for my kin,
Forgive me, Jasnah, for what I'll begin.

[outro]
In Kharbranth, between the books and lies,
Shallan Davar learns to wear disguise.

tracks.title: The Blackthorn Remembers
tracks.voice_instruct: A deep, commanding male bass-baritone with gravelly warmth, like a war-weary general finding redemption, powerful low register with occasional breaks into desperate intensity
tracks.prompt: progressive rock opera, cinematic, heavy military rock with distorted industrial Thrill riff pulsing under war drums, Honor's Theme hymn-like major key melody emerging from clean guitar arpeggio over organ during book-reading scenes, dramatic male vocals, orchestral arrangements, concept album continuity, theatrical
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
They called me Blackthorn when I burned the world,
When every banner shook and every flag unfurled,
I was the fist of Alethkar, the blade,
The Thrill sang in my blood with every raid.

[verse 2]
But now I read a dead man's words at night,
The Way of Kings, a lantern in the blight,
"A leader's duty is to those he leads,"
And something cracks inside me as I read.

[chorus]
The Blackthorn remembers, the Blackthorn atones,
For cities burned to ash, for broken bones,
The visions come in every highstorm's eye,
A voice that says, "Unite them, or they die."

[bridge]
The Thrill, the hunger, heartbeat like a drum,
It calls me back to what I used to become,
But the book says there is another way,
A kingdom built on honor, not on prey.

[verse 3]
My brother died upon a treaty night,
And I cannot remember, lost the fight,
With my own past, a gap where memory should be,
The Blackthorn is a stranger, even to me.

[outro]
Unite them, says the vision in the storm,
Unite them, before the Everstorm is born.
